price: “(Nuti) dhugamaan si gammachiifne; Abdii kutattoota irraa hin ta’in” jedhaniin.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū basharnāka bil-ḥaqi falā takun mina al-qāniṭīna
